title: Crop storage sensor system
summary: Wireless sensors designed to transmit temperature, CO2 and relative humidity information to a mobile, tablet or PC.

eligible.eligibleBullet01: be a crop storage sensor system.
eligible.eligibleBullet02: a system control unit able to send information to mobile phone, tablet or computer.
eligible.eligibleBullet03: an alert function when temperature or humidity fall outside the permitted range.
eligible.eligibleBullet04: sensor to measure internal store temperature.
eligible.eligibleBullet07: sensor to measure internal store humidity.
